price: Kuma ka saurãra a rãnar da mai kira ke yin kira daga wuri *makusanci.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
footnotes: * Mai kira shĩ ne Isrãfĩlu a cikin ƙaho a Baitil Maƙadis dõmin a nan ƙasa ta fi zama kusa da samã.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
